name: Delivers a smooth, close shave without irritation.
description:
Schaf Shave Cream delivers a smooth, close shave 
without irritation. Jam packed with vegetable and 
coconut derived lubricants and moisturizers to soften 
the beard and provide optimum slip. This premium 
cream stays close to the skin, as you want as much 
shave lubricant between your skin and your razor as 
possible for a smooth, close shave without irritation. 
And it is free of foaming irritants, so it won't dry out 
your skin. This shave cream truly performs - even on
sensitive skin.

Can be used with or without a shaving brush. (But a shaving brush is one of the best tools you can use for superb results.)

No Parabens 
All Natural Preservative 
Environmentally Friendly 
No Animal Testing

name: With natural and organic botanicals & antioxidants.
description:
Schaf Hydrate includes natural and organic ingredients of plant and tree derived oils, skin friendly botanical extracts, and organic shea and aloe. It also includes the cold pressed goodness of avocado, organic coconut, sunflower, and pumpkin seed oils.

These oils, working with botanicals and antioxidants, are designed to rejuvenate, heal, and improve skin's texture. We added skin reconditioning comfrey and vitamin E, and elder extract to calm and sooth your skin. 
Cucumber and mallow extract assist in reducing skin irritation, and organic aloe helps skin's flexibility and hydration. 

With the addition of Matrixyl 3000, a powerful and proven anti-wrinkle peptide, this moisturizer truly performs. 

No Parabens 
All Natural Preservative 
Environmentally Friendly 
No Animal Testing

name: An all natural, gentle & effective cleanser.
description:
Schaf Cleanse is a gentle, effective cleanser with the 
soothing properties of a toner. Use in the morning, 
after a work out, and at night before you go to bed to 
remove excess oils, dirt and toxins that have built up 
during the day. The mild foaming action is derived from 
plant extracts of corn, coconut, and sugar beets, all 
combined into a creamy consistency. It has Chamomile, 
Aloe, Cucumber, and Japanese Green Tea extracts that
soothe, heal, restore, and deliver protective 
anti-oxidants. Leaves your skin clean and refreshed.


No Parabens 
All Natural Preservative 
Environmentally Friendly 
No Animal Testing

name: Buffs dirt off, removes tired skin cells, and rejuvenates skin.
description:
Schaf Scrub is a mild, full foaming wash with white lava 
and apricot shell particulates suspended throughout 
the gel. This light scrubbing action buffs dirt off and 
removes tired skin cells, cleans your pores, and 
rejuvenates the naturally occurring collagen in your 
skin. Combined with natural vegetable based 
surfactants and Aloe Vera, it offers a smooth after feel 
with a restorative effect. Use every few days, and it will
provide you a clearer complexion, flake-free skin, 
improve your shave, and rejuvinate your skin. Always
follow with Schaf Hydrate.


No Parabens 
All Natural Preservative 
Environmentally Friendly 
No Animal Testing
